casebody.data:
Ferdinand W. MOSTERTZ, Appellant, v. QUAKER PILE FABRIC CORPORATION, Appellee. No. 6677. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Jan. 10, 1939. T. Bertram Humphries, of Philadelphia, Pa., for appellant. Henry N. Paul, Jr., of Philadelphia, Pa. (Wallace D. Newcomb, Henry N. Paul, Jr., and Alexander N. Rubin, all of Philadelphia, Pa., of counsel), for appellee.

Before MARIS and CLARK, Circuit Judges, and KALODNER, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed upon the opinion, 26 F.Supp. 250, of Judge Kirkpatrick of the court below.
